original_title: テレビ業界 裏 心霊動画 残酷業界編
overview: A video recorded when a young female staff member visited an abandoned shrine in the mountains, which is famous for haunting spirits, during location scouting. The atmosphere of the place changes completely when the locals appear to warn them of entering the shrine without permission... "Abandoned shrine location scouting" and other shocking footage of horror hidden behind the TV industry that has never been seen.
title: テレビ業界 裏 心霊動画 残酷業界編
